Key Match Events: Kane Williamson scored 78 runs before retiring hurt
Daryl Mitchell scored an unbeaten 89 to lead New Zealand to an 8-wicket win
Mustafizur Rahman took 1 wicket for 36 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson's return to international cricket was successful despite a knee injury
New Zealand maintained their dominance in the World Cup with their third win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh struggled with their top-order batting, falling to 56 for 4 at one point
Others: Lockie Ferguson was the standout bowler for New Zealand, taking 3 wickets
